allow: Bash(timeout 5 bash -c 'while ! curl -s http://127.0.0.1:5000 > /dev/null; do sleep 0.5; done; echo ""Server is ready!""')
Bash(timeout 5 bash -c 'while ! curl -s http://127.0.0.1:5000 > /dev/null; do sleep 0.5; done; echo ""Server ready""')
Bash(timeout 5 bash -c 'while ! curl -s http://127.0.0.1:5000 > /dev/null; do sleep 0.5; done; echo ""Server ready""')
Bash(powershell -Command "Get-Process python -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Select-Object Id, ProcessName")
Bash(powershell -Command "Get-Process python -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Select-Object Id, ProcessName, StartTime | Format-Table")
